body: Perry, The normal direction of the surface indicates the orientation and not their relative position in Rhino scene. In your case the normal directions are backwards so the surfaces located on the south side are actually facing north. Flip the surfaces and use them as test geometries. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VmQph4T03Lx5kZjY3UEu2I4h59Jo*zCuvbjdUiUc2kwJQDhNanfwPoAcR0vzspllUc4Z7Ogt5WdQg44ZeCzyEiLH--mJkfbV/sunlighthours_surfacenormal.png)
